title: Did Derry Maxson twist and delete a disregard for the Facebook Life incident in Chicago?
subtitle: An unreliable Twitter account published a fake tweet attributed to Civil Rights activist Drey McKensen, suggesting that he said "no problem" in a violent act in Chicago.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Civil rights activist Drey McKisen quickly deleted Twitter, saying that he had no problem with the contemporary Facebook virus live crime in Chicago.
